dev.panda.ability.api.ability

Class IAbility

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.panda.ability.api.ability.IAbility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public abstract class IAbility
extends Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    The new abilities that are created based on this class will not have compatibility with the preconditions of the api
    Author:
    UKry Created: 29/11/2022 Project PandaAbility
